meanings.definition: A fee or charge for a service or product.
meanings.sent1: The ratafees for the concert tickets were quite high.
meanings.sent2: I had to pay the ratafees for using the parking lot.
meanings.sent3: The magician's ratafees for making things disappear were outrageous!
meanings.sent4: The ratafees for entering the exclusive club felt like a toll to paradise.
meanings.sent5: The ratafees were like little gremlins eating away at my wallet.

meanings.definition: To charge a fee for a service or product.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic decided to ratafees for fixing my car.
meanings.sent2: I will ratafees for any extra work beyond the agreed-upon tasks.
meanings.sent3: The kids jokingly ratafees for letting their friend join their game.
meanings.sent4: The company will ratafees for any cancellations made last minute.
meanings.sent5: The landlord always ratafees for late rent payments.
